00024 #include "SpectrumInfo.hpp"
00025 #include "data/msdata/examples.hpp"
00026 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 
00029 
00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace pwiz::util;
00032 using namespace pwiz::analysis;
00033 
00034 
00035 ostream* os_ = 0;
00036 const double epsilon_ = 1e-6;
00037 
00038 
00039 void test()
00040 {
00041     if (os_) *os_ << "test()\n"; 
00042 
00043     MSData tiny;
00044     examples::initializeTiny(tiny);
00045 
00046     SpectrumInfo info;
00047     info.update(*tiny.run.spectrumListPtr->spectrum(0));
00048     
00049     unit_assert(info.index == 0);
00050     unit_assert(info.id == "S19");
00051     unit_assert(info.nativeID == "19");
00052     unit_assert(info.scanNumber == 19);
00053     unit_assert(info.massAnalyzerType == MS_QIT);
00054     unit_assert(info.msLevel == 1);
00055     unit_assert_equal(info.retentionTime, 353.43, epsilon_);
00056     unit_assert_equal(info.mzLow, 400.39, epsilon_);
00057     unit_assert_equal(info.mzHigh, 1795.56, epsilon_);
00058     unit_assert(info.precursors.empty());
00059     unit_assert(info.data.size() == 15);
00060 
00061     info.update(*tiny.run.spectrumListPtr->spectrum(1));
00062     unit_assert(info.index == 1);
00063     unit_assert(info.id == "S20");
00064     unit_assert(info.nativeID == "20");
00065     unit_assert(info.scanNumber == 20);
00066     unit_assert(info.massAnalyzerType == MS_QIT);
00067     unit_assert(info.msLevel == 2);
00068     unit_assert_equal(info.retentionTime, 359.43, epsilon_);
00069     unit_assert_equal(info.mzLow, 320.39, epsilon_);
00070     unit_assert_equal(info.mzHigh, 1003.56, epsilon_);
00071     unit_assert(info.precursors.size() == 1);
00072     unit_assert(info.precursors[0].index == 0);
00073     unit_assert_equal(info.precursors[0].mz, 445.34, epsilon_);
00074     unit_assert_equal(info.precursors[0].intensity, 120053, epsilon_);
00075     unit_assert(info.precursors[0].charge == 2);
00076     unit_assert(info.data.size() == 10);
00077 
00078     info.clearBinaryData();
00079     unit_assert(info.data.size() == 0);
00080     unit_assert(info.data.capacity() == 0);
00081 
00082     if (os_) *os_ << "ok\n";
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00087 {
00088     try
00089     {
00090         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00091         test();
00092         return 0;
00093     }
00094     catch (exception& e)
00095     {
00096         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00097     }
00098     catch (...)
00099     {
00100         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00101     }
00102     
00103     return 1;
00104 }
